page.title: 05CHANGING TIMES, SEAMILL
page.content: A lot of{houses}have been{built}on what was{once farmland,}stretching out along the A78(T) road towards Ardrossan. People in Seamill{travel to {work}in other towns as there are only a handful of jobs in the village. {Fashions}in clothing have{changed}over the years. Girls today generally wear trousers like jeans or ski-pants and the boys wear tight jeans or canvas trousers and denim jackets. Men generally wear suits with a shirt or tie, and women either wear skirts or trousers. There is a lot more{transport}in Seamill now.{There are several bus {stops and the buses come every {halfhour.}More people have cars, teenage boys have motorbikes and younger children have bicycles.
